snippet: In the latest installment in The Agenda series, John M. Broder asks: How much of the weird weather so much of the world is experiencing can be attributed to global warming, and how much to the natural variability of climate? The question has...
abstract: In the latest installment in The Agenda series, John M. Broder asks: How much of the weird weather so much of the world is experiencing can be attributed to global warming, and how much to the natural variability of climate? The question has political implications as well as scientific ones.

headline.main: The Agenda: How to Parse Climate Change and Extreme Weather?
